seriesJson.title: Konrad Adenauer specials
seriesJson.description: Special programming commemorating the life of Konrad Adenauer, chancellor of West Germany from 1949 to 1963.

node.title: The Adenauer era
node.description: An overview of the period when Karl Adenauer was chancellor of West Germany.

node.title: Adenauer: Thoughts on democracy
node.description: This program presents excerpts from Karl Adenauer's "Thoughts on Democracy."

node.description: This program presents an obituary of German statesman, Karl Adenauer.
